Applied Calculus Ch. 3 Sec. 1 Prob. 30
========================================================
```{r include=FALSE}
require(mosaic)
require(ScoreR)
startProblem("AC-3-1-30")
```
Following the notation in the book, we'll write the equation $y = a x^2 + b x + c$ to stand for a function of $x$, that is, $y = f(x) = a x^2 + b x + c$.

```{r include=FALSE}
prob1=selectSet(name="3.1.30", totalPts=1, "ax + b"=FALSE, "2a + bx"=FALSE, "2ax + b"=TRUE, "2ax + bx"=FALSE)
```
Find the derivative $dy/dx$ of the function $y = a x^2 + b x + c$. `r I(prob1)`

`r I(endProblem())`
